alert.note: Alert for Copper River Basin (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued August 03 at 3:53PM AKDT until August 05 at 8:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING FOR HOT DRY AND WINDY CONDITIONS FOR THE COPPER RIVER VALLEY... The National Weather Service in Anchorage has issued a Fire Weather Watch FOR HOT DRY AND WINDY CONDITIONS, which is in effect from Saturday afternoon through Saturday evening. * Winds...South 14 to 18 mph. Gusts up to 25 mph. * Timing...Saturday afternoon through evening. * Relative Humidity...As low as 20 percent. * Temperatures...Upper 70s to low 80s. * Location...The Copper River Valley. * Impacts...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires will be possible.
info.instruction: A fire weather watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them to the public.
